Package software.amazon.smithy.cli

Interface Style

All Known Implementing Classes:
Style.Constant, Style.Multi
public interface Style
Colors and styles for use with AnsiColorFormatter or CliPrinter.

ANSI codes returned by this interface should not include the opening \033[, the final ;m when opening styles, or the closing [0m. These escapes are added automatically when multiple styles are applied.
